title.text: RFC 5831: GOST R 34.11-94: Hash Function Algorithm

contents.text:
Independent Submission                                  V. Dolmatov, Ed.
Request for Comments: 5831                               Cryptocom, Ltd.
Category: Informational                                       March 2010
ISSN: 2070-1721

This document is intended to be a source of information about the Russian Federal standard hash function (GOST R 34.11-94), which is one of the Russian cryptographic standard algorithms (called GOST algorithms). Recently, Russian cryptography is being used in Internet applications, and this document has been created as information for developers and users of GOST R 34.11-94 for hash computation.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件旨在作为俄罗斯联邦标准哈希函数（GOST R 34.11-94）的信息来源，该函数是俄罗斯加密标准算法（称为GOST算法）之一。最近，俄罗斯密码学正在互联网应用中使用，本文档已创建为GOST R 34.11-94的开发者和用户提供信息，用于哈希计算。

contents.text: This document is not an Internet Standards Track specification; it is published for informational purposes.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件不是互联网标准跟踪规范；它是为了提供信息而发布的。

contents.text: This is a contribution to the RFC Series, independently of any other RFC stream. The RFC Editor has chosen to publish this document at its discretion and makes no statement about its value for implementation or deployment. Documents approved for publication by the RFC Editor are not a candidate for any level of Internet Standard; see Section 2 of RFC 5741.
contents.zh-CHS: 这是对RFC系列的贡献，独立于任何其他RFC流。RFC编辑器已选择自行发布此文档，并且未声明其对实现或部署的价值。RFC编辑批准发布的文件不适用于任何级别的互联网标准；见RFC 5741第2节。

contents.text: Information about the current status of this document, any errata, and how to provide feedback on it may be obtained at http://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc5831.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关本文件当前状态、任何勘误表以及如何提供反馈的信息，请访问http://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc5831.

contents.zh-CHS: 不得修改本文件，也不得创建其衍生作品，除非将其格式化为RFC出版或将其翻译为英语以外的其他语言。

contents.text: 1. GOST R 34.11-94 [GOST3411] was developed by the Federal Agency for Government Communication and Information and by the All-Russia Scientific and Research Institute of Standardization.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. GOST R 34.11-94[GOST3411]由联邦政府通信和信息局以及全俄罗斯标准化科学研究院开发。

contents.text: 2. GOST R 34.11-94 was accepted and activated by Act 154 of 23.05.1994 issued by the Russian Federal committee for standards.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. GOST R 34.11-94被俄罗斯联邦标准委员会发布的1994年5月23日第154号法案接受并激活。

contents.text: Expanding the application of information technologies when creating, processing, and storing documents requires, in some cases, confidentiality of their contents, maintenance of completeness, and authenticity.
contents.zh-CHS: 在创建、处理和存储文档时扩展信息技术的应用在某些情况下需要对其内容保密、保持完整性和真实性。

contents.text: Cryptography (cryptographic security) is one of the effective approaches for data security. It is widely applied in different areas of government and commercial activity.
contents.zh-CHS: 密码学（cryptographic security）是数据安全的有效方法之一。它广泛应用于政府和商业活动的不同领域。

contents.text: Cryptographic data security methods are under serious scientific research and standardization efforts at national, regional, and international levels.
contents.zh-CHS: 加密数据安全方法正在国家、地区和国际各级进行认真的科学研究和标准化工作。

contents.text: GOST R 34.11-94 defines a hash function calculation procedure for an arbitrary sequence of binary symbols.
contents.zh-CHS: GOST R 34.11-94定义了任意二进制符号序列的哈希函数计算过程。

contents.text: The hash function maps an arbitrary set of data represented as a sequence of binary symbols onto its image of a fixed small length.
contents.zh-CHS: 哈希函数将表示为二进制符号序列的任意数据集映射到其固定小长度的图像上。

contents.text: Thus, hash functions can be used in procedures related to the electronic digital signature, resulting in considerable reduction of elapsed time for the sign and verify stages. The effect of the reduction of time is due to the fact that only a short image of initial data is actually signed.
contents.zh-CHS: 因此，可以在与电子数字签名相关的过程中使用散列函数，从而大大减少签名和验证阶段的运行时间。缩短时间的效果是由于只有初始数据的短图像被实际签名。

contents.text: GOST R 34.11-94 defines an algorithm and procedure for the calculation of a hash function for an arbitrary sequence of binary symbols. These algorithms and procedures should be applied in cryptographic methods of data processing and securing, including digital signature procedures employed for data transfer and data storage in computer-aided systems.
contents.zh-CHS: GOST R 34.11-94定义了用于计算任意二进制符号序列的哈希函数的算法和程序。这些算法和程序应用于数据处理和安全的加密方法，包括计算机辅助系统中用于数据传输和数据存储的数字签名程序。

contents.text: The hash function, defined in GOST R 34.11-94, is used for digital signature systems based on the asymmetric cryptographic algorithm according to GOST R 34.10-2001 (see section 3).
contents.zh-CHS: GOST R 34.11-94中定义的哈希函数用于基于GOST R 34.10-2001中非对称加密算法的数字签名系统（见第3节）。

contents.text: The following notations are used in GOST R 34.11-94:
contents.zh-CHS: GOST R 34.11-94中使用了以下符号：

contents.text:
V_all is a set of all finite words in the alphabet V = {0,1}.  The
words are read from right to left and the alphabet symbols are
numbered from right to left (i.e., the rightmost symbol of the word
has the number one, the second rightmost symbol has number two,
etc.).

Vk is a set of all words in alphabet V = {0,1} of length k bits
(k=16,64,256).
|A| is the length of a word A belonging to V_all.

A||B is a concatenation of words A, B belonging to V_all. Its length is |A| + |B|, where the left |A| symbols come from the word A, and the right |B| symbols come from the word B. One can also use the notation A||B = A * B.
contents.zh-CHS: A | | B是属于V|all的单词A、B的串联。它的长度是| A |+| B |，其中左| A |符号来自单词A，右| B |符号来自单词B。也可以使用符号A | B=A*B。

contents.text: A^k is a concatenation of k copies of the word A (A belongs to V_all).
contents.zh-CHS: A^k是单词A（A属于V_all）的k个副本的串联。

contents.text: <N>_k is a word of length k, containing a binary representation of N(mod 2^k) residue, with a non-negative integer N.
contents.zh-CHS: <N> _k是一个长度为k的字，包含N（mod 2^k）余数的二进制表示，带有一个非负整数N。

contents.text: A^$ is a non-negative integer with A as its binary representation.
contents.zh-CHS: A^$是一个非负整数，二进制表示形式为A。

contents.text: (xor) is the bitwise modulo 2 addition of the words of the same length.
contents.zh-CHS: （xor）是相同长度字的按位模2加法。

contents.text:
(+)' is the addition according to the rule A (+)' B = <A^$+ B^$>_k,
where k = |A| = |B|.
M is a binary sequence to be hashed, M belongs to V_all. M is a message in digital signature systems.
contents.zh-CHS: M是要散列的二进制序列，M属于V_all。M是数字签名系统中的消息。

contents.text: h is a hash function that maps the sequence M belonging to V_all onto the word h(M) belonging to V_256.
contents.zh-CHS: h是一个哈希函数，它将属于V_all的序列M映射到属于V_256的单词h（M）。

contents.text: E(k,A) is a result of the encryption of the word A using key K with the encryption algorithm according to [GOST28147] in the electronic codebook (ECB) mode (K belongs to V256, A belongs to V64).
contents.zh-CHS: E（k，A）是在电子码本（ECB）模式（k属于V256，A属于V64）下，使用密钥k和根据[GOST28147]的加密算法对单词A进行加密的结果。

contents.text: h0 is an initial hash value.
e := g is the assignment of the value g to the parameter e.
i = 1..8 is an interval with i being all the values from 1 to 8.
contents.zh-CHS: i=1..8是一个区间，i是从1到8的所有值。

contents.text: hUZ is the S-boxes described in [GOST28147].
A hash function h is the mapping h : V_all -> V256, depending on the parameter (which is the initial hash value H, H is a word from V256). To define the hash function, it is necessary to have:
contents.zh-CHS: 散列函数h是映射h:V_all->V256，具体取决于参数（它是初始散列值h，h是V256中的一个字）。要定义哈希函数，必须具有：

contents.text: - a calculation algorithm for the step-by-step hash function
contents.zh-CHS: - 一种分步hash函数的计算算法

contents.text: - a description of an iterative procedure for calculating the hash value h
contents.zh-CHS: - 用于计算散列值h的迭代过程的描述

contents.text: A hash function h depends on two parameters, h0 and hUZ.
contents.zh-CHS: 散列函数h取决于两个参数h0和hUZ。

contents.text: A calculation algorithm for the step-by-step hash function contains three parts, which successively do:
contents.zh-CHS: 分步散列函数的计算算法包含三个部分，分别是：

contents.text: - key generation, here keys are 256-bit words;
contents.zh-CHS: - 密钥生成，这里的密钥是256位字；

contents.text: - an encryption transformation, that is encryption of 64-bit subwords of word H using keys K[i], (i = 1, 2, 3, 4) with the algorithm according to [GOST28147] in ECB mode; and
contents.zh-CHS: - 加密转换，即在ECB模式下使用密钥K[i]，（i=1,2,3,4）和根据[GOST28147]的算法对字H的64位子字进行加密；和

contents.text: - a mixing transformation for the result of the encryption.
Consider X = (b[256], b[255], ..., b[1]) belongs to V256.
The transformation P : V256 -> V256 maps the word xi32||...||xi1 onto the word xi[phi(32)] || ... || xi[phi(1)],
contents.zh-CHS: 转换P:V256->V256将单词xi32 | | | | | | xi1映射到单词xi[phi（32）]| | | | |xi[phi（1）]，

contents.text: For the key generation, one should use the following initial data:
contents.zh-CHS: 对于密钥生成，应使用以下初始数据：

contents.text: - words H, M belonging to V256,
The following algorithm is used for the key calculation:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下算法用于密钥计算：

contents.text: If it is true, go to step 7. If not, go to step 5.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果为真，请转至步骤7。如果没有，请转至步骤5。

contents.text: U := A(U)(xor)C[i], V := A(A(V)), W := U(xor)V, K[i] = P(W).
At this stage, 64-bit subwords of the word H are encrypted using keys K[i] (i = 1, 2, 3, 4).
contents.zh-CHS: 在此阶段，使用密钥K[i]（i＝1、2、3、4）对字H的64位子字进行加密。

contents.text: For the encryption transformation, one should use the following initial data:
contents.zh-CHS: 对于加密转换，应使用以下初始数据：

contents.text: where h[i] belongs to V64, i = 1,2,3,4, and a key set is K[1], K[2], K[3], K[4].
The encryption algorithm is applied and the following words are obtained:
contents.zh-CHS: 应用加密算法并获得以下文字：

contents.text: As a result of the stage, the following sequence is formed:
contents.zh-CHS: 作为该阶段的结果，形成以下顺序：

contents.text: At this stage, the obtained sequence is mixed using a shift register.
contents.zh-CHS: 在此阶段，使用移位寄存器混合获得的序列。

contents.text: The initial data includes words H, M belonging to V256 and a word S belonging to V256 .
contents.zh-CHS: 初始数据包括属于V256的字H、M和属于V256的字S。

contents.text: Let a mapping PSI(X) : V256(2) -> V256(2) transform the word:
eta[16]||eta[15]||...||eta[1], eta[i] belongs to V16, i = 1..16
Then, the value of the step-by-step hash function value is the word:
contents.zh-CHS: 然后，逐步散列函数值的值为单词：

contents.text: where PSI^i(X) is the transformation PSI applied i times to X.
contents.zh-CHS: 其中，PSI^i（X）是应用于X的i次转换PSI。

contents.text: 6. The Calculation Procedure for a Hash Function
The calculation procedure for a hash function h is assumed to be applied to a sequence M belonging to V_all. Its parameter is an initial hash value h0, which is an arbitrarily fixed word from V256.
contents.zh-CHS: 假设散列函数h的计算过程应用于属于V_all的序列M。它的参数是初始散列值h0，它是V256中的任意固定字。

contents.text: The calculation procedure for the function h uses the following quantities at each step of iteration:
contents.zh-CHS: 函数h的计算程序在迭代的每个步骤中使用以下量：

contents.text: _M_ belonging to V_all - a part of the sequence M, which was not hashed at previous iterations;
contents.zh-CHS: _M_u属于V_all-序列M的一部分，在以前的迭代中没有散列；

contents.text: H belonging to V256 - the current hash value;
SIGMA belonging to V256 - the current check sum value;
contents.zh-CHS: 属于V256的西格玛-当前校验和值；

contents.text: L belonging to V256 - the length of the partial sequence M processed at the previous iteration step.
contents.zh-CHS: L属于V256-在上一迭代步骤中处理的部分序列M的长度。

contents.text: The calculation algorithm for function h consists of the following steps:
contents.zh-CHS: 函数h的计算算法包括以下步骤：

contents.text: Step 1. Assign initial values to current quantities:
contents.zh-CHS: 第一步。将初始值指定给当前数量：

contents.text: If it is true, go to step 3.
3.1 Calculate a subword M_s belonging to V256 of the word _M_ (_M_ = M_p||M_s). Then make the following calculations:
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1 计算属于单词_M_（_M_=M_p | | M_s）的V256的子单词M_s。然后进行以下计算：

contents.text: The quantity H obtained at step 2.7 is the value of the hash function h(M).
contents.zh-CHS: 在步骤2.7中获得的数量H是散列函数H（M）的值。

contents.text: It is recommended to use the values for substitution units pi[1], pi[2],..., pi[8] and the initial hash value H described in this appendix for the GOST R 34.11-94 test examples only.
contents.zh-CHS: 建议仅在GOST R 34.11-94测试示例中使用本附录中描述的替换单元pi[1]、pi[2]、…、pi[8]的值和初始散列值H。

contents.text: The algorithm GOST 28147-89 [GOST28147] in ECB mode is used as an encryption transformation in the following examples. The following values of the substitution units pi[1], pi[2],..., pi[8] have been chosen:
contents.zh-CHS: 在以下示例中，ECB模式下的算法GOST 28147-89[GOST28147]用作加密转换。已选择替换单元pi[1]、pi[2]、…、pi[8]的以下值：

contents.text: 1 F B B C D 8 B A
The hexadecimal value of pi[j](i) is given in a column number j,
contents.zh-CHS: pi[j]（i）的十六进制值在列号j中给出，

contents.text: j = 1..8, and in a row number i, i = 0..15.
We will put down binary symbol sequences as hexadecimal digits strings, where each digit corresponds to four signs of its binary representation.
contents.zh-CHS: 我们将把二进制符号序列记为十六进制数字字符串，其中每个数字对应于其二进制表示的四个符号。

contents.text: 7.3 Examples of the Hash Value Calculation
A zero vector, for example, can be taken as an initial hash value:
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，可以将零向量作为初始散列值：

contents.text: 7.3.1. Hash Calculation for the Sample Message M
Initial values are assigned for the text:
for the sum of text blocks:
for the length of the text:
If the length of the message to be hashed equals 256 bits (32 bytes), then:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果要散列的消息长度等于256位（32字节），则：

contents.text: and there is no need to pad the current block with zeroes:
contents.zh-CHS: 无需在当前块上填充零：

contents.text: The step-by-step hash function chi(M, N) values are calculated.
K[4] = A0E2804E FF1B73F2 ECE27A00 E7B8C7E1 EE1D620C AC0CC5BA A804C05E A18B0AEC
contents.zh-CHS: K[4]=A0E2804E FF1B73F2 ECE27A00 E7B8C7E1 EE1D620C AC0CC5BA A804C05E A18B0AEC

contents.text: The 64-bit subwords of block H are encrypted by the algorithm according to GOST 28147.
contents.zh-CHS: 根据GOST 28147的算法对块H的64位子字进行加密。

contents.text: Block h[1] = 00000000 00000000 is encrypted using key K[1] and s[1] = 42ABBCCE 32BC0B1B is obtained.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用密钥K[1]对块h[1]=00000000 00000000进行加密，并获得s[1]=42abbce 32BC0B1B。

contents.text: Block h[2] = 00000000 00000000 is encrypted using key K[2] and s[2] = 5203EBC8 5D9BCFFD is obtained.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用密钥K[2]对块h[2]=00000000 00000000进行加密，并获得s[2]=5203EBC8 5D9BCFFD。

contents.text: Block h[3] = 00000000 00000000 is encrypted using key K[3] and s[3] = 8D345899 00FF0E28 is obtained.
Block h[4] = 00000000 00000000 is encrypted using key K[4] and s[4] = E7860419 0D2A562D is obtained.
The mixing transformation using a shift register is performed and
contents.zh-CHS: 使用移位寄存器执行混合变换，并

contents.text: Assign H = KSI and calculate chi(L, H):
Now assign H = KSI again and calculate chi( SIGMA, H):
K[2] = E82759E0 C278D950 15CC523C FC72EBB6 D2C73DA8 19A6CAC9 3E8440F5 C0DDB65A
7.3.2. Hash Calculation for the Sample Message M

As the length of the message to be hashed equals 400 bits (50 bytes), the message is divided into two blocks, and the second (high-order) one is padded with zeroes. During the calculations the following numbers are obtained:
contents.zh-CHS: 由于要散列的消息长度等于400位（50字节），消息被分为两个块，第二个（高阶）块用零填充。在计算过程中，获得了以下数字：

contents.text: K[4] = EBACCB00 F7006DFB E5E16905 B0B0DFFF BA1C3509 FD118DF9 F61B830F F8C554E5
contents.zh-CHS: K[4]=EBACB00 F7006DFB E5E16905 B0B0DFFF BA1C3509 FD118DF9 F61B830F F8C554E5

contents.text: S = FF41797C EEAADAC2 43C9B1DF 2E14681C EDDC2210 1EE1ADF9 FA67E757 DAFE3AD9
contents.zh-CHS: S=FF41797C EEAADAC2 43C9B1DF 2E14681C EDDC221 1EE1ADF9 FA67E757 DAFE3 AD9

contents.text: KSI = F0CEEA4E 368B5A60 C63D96C1 E5B51CD2 A93BEFBD 2634F0AD CBBB69CE ED2D5D9A
contents.zh-CHS: KSI=F0CEEA4E 368B5A60 C63D96C1 E5B51CD2 A93BEFBD 2634F0AD CBBB69CE ED2D5D9A

contents.text: H = F0CEEA4E 368B5A60 C63D96C1 E5B51CD2 A93BEFBD 2634F0AD CBBB69CE ED2D5D9A
contents.zh-CHS: H=F0CEEA4E 368B5A60 C63D96C1 E5B51CD2 A93BEFBD 2634F0AD CBBB69CE ED2D5D9A

contents.text: K[1] = 95FEB83E BE3C2833 A09D7C9E BE45B6FE 88432CF6 D56CBC57 AAE8136D 02215B39
contents.zh-CHS: K[1]=95FEB83E BE3C2833 A09D7C9E BE45B6FE 88432CF6 D56CBC57 AAE8136D 02215B39

contents.text: This entire document is about security considerations.
contents.zh-CHS: 整个文档都是关于安全方面的考虑。

contents.text: Current cryptographic resistance of GOST R 34.11-94 hash algorithm is estimated as 2^128 operations of computations of step hash functions. (There is a known method to reduce this estimate to 2^105 operations, but it demands padding the colliding message with 1024 random bit blocks each of 256-bit length; thus, it cannot be used in any practical implementation).
contents.zh-CHS: GOST R 34.11-94散列算法的当前密码抵抗估计为步骤散列函数计算的2^128次操作。（有一种已知的方法可以将此估计值减少到2^105个操作，但它需要使用1024个随机位块（每个块的长度为256位）填充冲突消息；因此，它不能用于任何实际实现）。

contents.text: [GOST28147] "Cryptographic Protection for Data Processing System", GOST 28147-89, Gosudarstvennyi Standard of USSR, Government Committee of the USSR for Standards, 1989. (In Russian)
contents.zh-CHS: [GOST28147]“数据处理系统的密码保护”，GOST 28147-89，苏联Gosudarstvenyi标准，苏联政府标准委员会，1989年。（俄语）

contents.text: [GOST3411] "Information technology. Cryptographic Data Security. Hashing function.", GOST R 34.10-94, Gosudarstvennyi Standard of Russian Federation, Government Committee of the Russia for Standards, 1994. (In Russian)
contents.zh-CHS: [GOST3411]“信息技术.加密数据安全.散列函数”，GOST R 34.10-94，俄罗斯联邦Gosudarstvenyi标准，俄罗斯政府标准委员会，1994年。（俄语）
